attributes.comment:
I ask that you please reconsider increasing the fees for adoption petitions for a
couple of reasons, one is purely a selfish reason -- I am in the process of adopting
a baby from China and I will have to submit a second petition before the adoption
is final because the process takes so long and the petition will expire.

The other reason is for the children -- if the fees are too expensive, good parents
maybe be discouraged or even prevented from applying to adopt. There are soooo
many children who need good homes and the price isn't cheap. I know my
daughter will be worth every penny and I am very excited about this opportunity,
but I am able to afford this process on my own. I know there are good people out
there who would be good parents and the price of adopting shouldn't stop them
from having the opportunity to be parents.

Please think about this proposed increase and the impact on the many children.

Thank you!

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Kathy M. Hauck
